StayInSCL.synopsis: Halsin tells the player his business is in SCL now and he will not leave.
StayInSCL.how_to_trigger: If the player has Halsin in their party and tries to travel back to WLD_Main_A or CRE_Main_A from SCL_Main_A

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided session, 'StayInSCL', is a standalone event that is triggered when the player, with Halsin in their party, attempts to travel from SCL_Main_A to WLD_Main_A or CRE_Main_A. There is no reference to another session that must occur before or after this session, nor any indication of a mutually exclusive relationship with another session.

StayInSCL_1.speaker: Halsin
StayInSCL_1.text: I cannot venture back with you - now that I am in a position to fight the curse, I must stay here and see it through.
StayInSCL_1.context: NodeContext: Some urgency. Halsin doesn't want to backtrack to previous regions while he's close to achieving his goals.

StayInSCL_4.speaker: Player
StayInSCL_4.text: Very well, I'll remain here with you.

StayInSCL_6.speaker: Halsin
StayInSCL_6.text: Thank you. I would hate to have to flee from the shadow curse once again.

StayInSCL_3.speaker: Player
StayInSCL_3.text: What if I need you by my side?

StayInSCL_7.speaker: Halsin
StayInSCL_7.text: If you truly need to retread your steps, then you will have little need for me there. You are more formidable than anything that lies in our wake.

StayInSCL_0.speaker: Halsin
StayInSCL_0.text: I must continue to investigate the curse - this may be my last chance. I shall await your return when you are ready to continue.

StayInSCL_2.speaker: Player
StayInSCL_2.text: Have it your way, then. Find somewhere safe to camp and I'll see you when I return.

StayInSCL_5.speaker: Halsin
StayInSCL_5.text: Very well. I shall seek out your camp as soon as you find yourself amidst the curse again.
